name: Aeroporto Estadual de Ribeirão Preto - Doutor Leite Lopes
nameEnglish: Ribeirão Preto State Airport - Dr. Leite Lopes
description: Ribeirão Preto’s airport honors Dr. Leite Lopes, famous doctor, aviation enthusiast and founder of the first flight school in the city. Its airport code honors the city of Ribe*rao* Preto.
